title: Cozy Apartment at Beautiful Arkonaplatz in Berlin
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


The 45m² apartment is conveniently located on the 1st floor directly across from Arkonaplatz in the trendy heart of Berlin. You can expect a bedroom / living room with a comfortably large bed (150x200), as well as a sofa, desk and WiFi. The window looks directly onto a nice and quiet little park. You can eat in a fully equipped separate kitchen with a dining table for up to 4 people. The bathroom has a large shower, plenty of counter space and a washing machine. The entire floor is covered with real wood parquet.
